entry.title: [New Position] Head of R&D, TRG Research and Development LTD

link.title: [New Position] Head of R&D, TRG Research and Development LTD

entry.content:
Summary:

As of today, I am part the RnD team of TRG. I will be up-taking the position of Head of R&D, in Limassol, Cyprus.
entry.summary: Summary: As of today, I am part the RnD team of TRG. I will be up-taking the position of Head of R&D, in Limassol, Cyprus.

entry.title: [New Position] Senior Server and Infrastructure Developer, PointRF Systems

link.title: [New Position] Senior Server and Infrastructure Developer, PointRF Systems

entry.content:
Summary:

As of today, I am joining the awesome RnD team of PointRF Systems Ltd. I will be up-taking the position of Senior Server and Infrastructure Developer, in Larnaca, Cyprus.

PointRFâ€™s innovative product family provides real-time location-awareness, vitals monitoring and infotainment functions to skilled nursing facilities in the US Long Term Care market.
entry.summary: Summary: As of today, I am joining the awesome RnD team of PointRF Systems Ltd. I will be up-taking the position of Senior Server and Infrastructure Developer, in Larnaca, Cyprus.

entry.title: Resident Mentor - Centre for Entrepreneurship (C4E)
entry.content:
Summary:

I am delighted to be invited as a Resident Mentor at the Centre for Entrepreneurship (C4E), of the University of Cyprus.

More info regarding my mentorship areas can be found here.
entry.summary: Summary: I am delighted to be invited as a Resident Mentor at the Centre for Entrepreneurship (C4E), of the University of Cyprus.

entry.title: Mentor - 1st Open Data Cyprus CrowdHackathon
entry.content:
Summary:

I am delighted to be invited as a Mentor at the 1st Open Data Cyprus CrowdHackathon, that will take place on 11-12 of September 2016, in Nicosia, Cyprus.
entry.summary: Summary: I am delighted to be invited as a Mentor at the 1st Open Data Cyprus CrowdHackathon, that will take place on 11-12 of September 2016, in Nicosia, Cyprus.

entry.title: :ramen: Indigo, minimalist jekyll theme
entry.content:
Example of project - Indigo Minimalist Jekyll Template - Demo. This is a simple and minimalist template for Jekyll for those who likes to eat noodles.

What has inside?

  • Gulp
  • BrowserSync
  • Stylus
  • SVG
  • Travis
  • No JS
  • 98/100

Check it out here. If you need some help, just tell me.

entry.title: [New Position] Part-Time Faculty, University of Nicosia

link.title: [New Position] Part-Time Faculty, University of Nicosia

entry.content:
Summary:

I have been appointed to the position of a part-time faculty member at the Department of Computer Science, University of Nicosia, Cyprus. In the upcoming semesters, I will have the privilege to teach core postgraduate and undergraduate courses in the areas of Mobile Computing and Programming Principles.
entry.summary: Summary: I have been appointed to the position of a part-time faculty member at the Department of Computer Science, University of Nicosia, Cyprus. In the upcoming semesters, I will have the privilege to teach core postgraduate and undergraduate courses in the areas of Mobile Computing and Programming Principles.

entry.title: Successfully defended my Ph.D thesis
entry.content:
Summary:

Today, I have successfully defended my Ph.D thesis titled Distributed Traffic Information Systems Based on V2X Communication in Large-Scale Urban Environments, under the supervision of Prof. Marios D. Dikaiakos.
entry.summary: Summary: Today, I have successfully defended my Ph.D thesis titled Distributed Traffic Information Systems Based on V2X Communication in Large-Scale Urban Environments, under the supervision of Prof. Marios D. Dikaiakos.

entry.title: AWS Research Grant - Awarded for CAMF project

link.title: AWS Research Grant - Awarded for CAMF project

entry.content:
Summary:

We are honoured that our Eclipse CAMF project has been selected selected to receive an Amazon Web Services(AWS) in Education Research grant.
entry.summary: Summary: We are honoured that our Eclipse CAMF project has been selected selected to receive an Amazon Web Services(AWS) in Education Research grant.

entry.title: CAMF accepted as an Eclipse Project

link.title: CAMF accepted as an Eclipse Project

entry.content:
Summary:

Cloud Application Magement Framework Accepted (CAMF) has been accepted as an official technology project at the Eclipse Foundation.
entry.summary: Summary: Cloud Application Magement Framework Accepted (CAMF) has been accepted as an official technology project at the Eclipse Foundation.

entry.title: c-Eclipse article accepted at EuroPar 2014
entry.content:
Summary:

Our work on the c-Eclipse framework, developed in the context of the CELAR EU FP7 project, has been accepted for publication at the International Conference on Parallel Processing (Euro-Par 2014).
entry.summary: Summary: Our work on the c-Eclipse framework, developed in the context of the CELAR EU FP7 project, has been accepted for publication at the International Conference on Parallel Processing (Euro-Par 2014).
